title: Introduction to Machine Learning Workshop
description: Join us for a hands-on workshop covering the fundamentals of machine learning. Learn about supervised learning, neural networks, and practical applications. Perfect for beginners with basic Python knowledge.

title: Spring Career Fair 2024
description: Connect with over 100 employers from various industries including tech, finance, healthcare, and consulting. Bring your resume and dress professionally. Open to all students.

title: Cultural Night: Celebrate Diversity
description: Experience the rich cultural heritage of our diverse student body through performances, food, and art. Featuring traditional dances, music, and cuisine from around the world.

title: Intramural Basketball Tournament
description: Sign up your team for our annual basketball tournament. All skill levels welcome. Great prizes for the winning team. Registration closes one week before the event.

title: Startup Pitch Competition
description: Watch student entrepreneurs pitch their startup ideas to a panel of investors and industry experts. Cash prizes available. Great networking opportunity for aspiring founders.

title: Photography Walk: Campus at Sunset
description: Explore the beautiful campus while learning photography techniques. Bring your camera or smartphone. Led by professional photographer. All skill levels welcome.

title: Mental Health Awareness Week Kickoff
description: Join us to start Mental Health Awareness Week. Learn about campus mental health resources, coping strategies, and how to support friends. Free stress relief activities included.

title: Hackathon: Build for Good
description: 24-hour coding competition focused on creating solutions for social good. Form teams, build projects, and win prizes. Meals and snacks provided. All skill levels welcome.

title: Resume Workshop
description: Learn how to craft a winning resume that gets noticed by recruiters. One-on-one feedback sessions available. Bring a draft of your resume for personalized tips.

title: Open Mic Night
description: Show off your talents at our monthly open mic night. Singers, comedians, poets, and musicians all welcome. Sign up at the door or email in advance to reserve a slot.

title: Data Science Study Group
description: Weekly study group for students interested in data science. We cover statistics, Python, SQL, and machine learning concepts. Great for exam prep and project help.

title: Yoga in the Park
description: Start your weekend right with outdoor yoga. All levels welcome, mats provided. Focus on stress relief and mindfulness. Ends with a guided meditation session.

title: Finance Club: Stock Market Basics
description: New to investing? Learn the fundamentals of the stock market, how to read financial statements, and strategies for building a portfolio. Free pizza provided.

title: Volunteer Day: Beach Cleanup
description: Help keep our local beach clean! Transportation provided. Gloves and bags supplied. Great opportunity for community service hours and meeting new friends.

title: Gaming Tournament: Super Smash Bros
description: Compete in our Super Smash Bros Ultimate tournament. Single elimination bracket. Entry fee covers snacks and prizes. Bring your own controller for best experience.
